overview: A New Zealand made for TV documentary about "the other pandemic", anxiety and related mental health issues, which affects 1 in four New Zealanders. Actress Robyn Malcolm shares her personal experiences with anxiety and panic attacks in a frank, funny and illuminating documentary about this debilitating and common human condition. Featuring interviews with former National Party leader Todd Muller, TV presenter Jenny-May Clarkson - who experienced panic attacks live on air - and musician Ladyhawke.
title: You, Me & Anxiety
